detail_desc: Short dress in jersey with a soft brushed finish. The dress has a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Leggings in soft jersey with a motif and an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft jersey with a motif and an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in suede with a soft shaft. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.
Short, boxy top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Short, boxy top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.

Leggings in jersey with a sheen. High waist with wide elastication.
Leggings in jersey with a sheen. High waist with wide elastication.

Padded gilet in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a concealed stand up collar and hood with an elastic drawstring. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped, fleece-lined side pockets and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Tailored leggings in jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, fake front pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs.
Suede sandals with covered heels and a high shaft with lacing at the front. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Suede loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Boiler suit in cotton twill with a resort collar, buttons at the top, flap chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back and adjustable tabs and fasteners at the sides. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and removable insoles, and chunky soles.

Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a high collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Jacket in a sturdy textured weave with glittery threads and contrasting colour details. Round neck, metal buttons down the front and front pockets with a decorative button. Lined.

Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a flounced trim at the top. One top with an all-over print.

Jumpsuit in jersey with draping. Deep V-neck, wrapover top, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.

Body in jersey with a wrapover top, deep V-neck and draping. Gathered seam at the shoulders and waist, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Non-wired bras in jersey with a wide, elasticated hem, adjustable shoulder straps and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs.

Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Tights in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a fine, pattern-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in double-weave organic cotton with a gently gathered yoke, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton with a round, frill-trimmed neckline, a hole pattern at the top and a gently flared, stocking-stitched skirt.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton velvet with shimmering buttons at the back, a seam at the hips with a small frill trim, and a skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Airy cotton poplin lining at the top.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Ankle-length jumpsuit in an organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons at the front and a seam at the waist with pleats at the front and elastication at the back. Pockets in the side seams and straight legs. Lined.
